original_text: “Say to this rebellious people, ‘Do you not know what these things mean?’ Say to them: ‘The king of Babylon went to Jerusalem and carried off her king and her nobles, bringing them back with him to Babylon.
korean_text: 너는 반역하는 족속에게 묻기를 너희가 이 비유를 깨닫지 못하겠느냐 하고 그들에게 말하기를 바벨론 왕이 예루살렘에 이르러 왕과 고관을 사로잡아 바벨론 자기에게로 끌어 가고

sentences.original_text: 'Do you not know what these things mean?'
'The king of Babylon went to Jerusalem
and carried off her king and her nobles,
bringing them back with him to Babylon.'
